title: cooldown?
body: since the update my game has been crashing when i start to play games and now it gave me a cooldown because i've went into games and ending up leaving because the game keeps crashing.. Not cool

replies.body: If you've been hit with a low priority queue by disconnecting from too many games, it may be a good time to take a step back and troubleshooting those crashes. It can be a little hard to narrow down what caused that crash without much info, but let's take a jab at it with our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know what works or not, and I can troubleshoot further if needed.
